title: TSMC Says 'No More' To Nvidia: Why That Is Intel's Golden Ticket
full_text: TSMC Says 'No More' To Nvidia: Why That Is Intel's Golden Ticket. The AI boom just hit a constraint investors don't talk about enough: you can't ship what you can't build.
